Package com.example.androidgpt_pro

Class EventDatabaseControl

java.lang.Object
com.example.androidgpt_pro.EventDatabaseControl
public class EventDatabaseControl extends Object
This is a class that controls the interaction between event data and the database.

    • calculateNextEventID

      public String calculateNextEventID(String value)
      This is a calculator to get the ID of the next event.
      Parameters:
      value - value: An 8 bits string number.
      Returns:
      valueAddOne valueAddOne: 8-digit number after adding 1.
